page.title: 06Family Life in Salterton
page.content: We interviewed a mother of four children living in Budleigh Salterton and she thought that the town was a good place to bring up a family, although houses are expensive and hard to come by,especially larger houses. There are plenty of things going on in the town to occupy younger children but not for the teenagers.There is a well-run playgroup and the Primary School is friendly. Jobs for older children are not so difficult to find as she thought at first. Bringing up a family is expensive but living near Normans Store saves a lot of money. Budleigh Salteron is a safe place to live but some tourists are not very careful.
